name: Don't Shoot Your Friend
description:
-STORY-

IN THE SOMEWHAT NEAR BUT STILL KINDA FAR AWAY FUTURE GUN CONTROL IS AT AN ALL TIME HIGH AND HUMANS, NOW TURNED TO NEON BLOCKS OF PURE SOCIAL MEDIA, GET THEIR KICKS BY NOT SHOOTING ONE ANOTHER, TESTING EACH OTHER'S ABILITY TO NOT SHOOT THEIR FRIEND.

-HOW TO PLAY-

Player one uses WSAD to move
Player two uses UP DOWN LEFT RIGHT to move

In the character select screen, use the UP and DOWN arrows to choose how long your round lasts.

Your goal is to jump into your friend's line of fire, and get killed by them as many times as possible.

Little multi-colored upgrade blocks will fall from the top of the screen, collecting them puts one of five effects onto your friend.

1- Slow down
2- Invert Controls
3- Increase Rate of Fire
4- Shrink
5- Sneeze (causes your friend to shoot a bullet in every direction)

These effects last until your friend either dies, or you collect another upgrade block.

-PRICE-

The game is now completely free! Enjoy, friends! If you'd like to pay something, that would be swell.
